00022 #region Usings
00023 using System.Collections.Generic;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 #endregion
00026 
00027 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.XFN
00028 {
00032     public class People
00033     {
00034         #region Constructor
00035 
00039         public People()
00040         {
00041             Relationships = new List<Relationship>();
00042         }
00043 
00044         #endregion
00045 
00046         #region Public Properties
00047 
00051         public string Name{get;set;}
00052 
00056         public string URL{get;set;}
00057 
00061         public List<Relationship> Relationships{get;set;}
00062 
00063         #endregion
00064 
00065         #region Public Overridden Function
00066 
00071         public override string ToString()
00072         {
00073             try
00074             {
00075                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00076                 Builder.Append("<a href=\"" + URL + "\"");
00077                 if (Relationships.Count > 0)
00078                 {
00079                     Builder.Append(" rel=\"");
00080                     foreach (Relationship Relationship in Relationships)
00081                     {
00082                         Builder.Append(Relationship.ToString() + " ");
00083                     }
00084                     Builder.Append("\"");
00085                 }
00086                 Builder.Append(">");
00087                 Builder.Append(Name);
00088                 Builder.Append("</a>");
00089                 return Builder.ToString();
00090             }
00091             catch { throw; }
00092         }
00093 
00094         #endregion
00095     }
00096 }
